title: Teenager shot in the leg; JPD searching for suspect
content:
JACKSON, MS (Mississippi News Now) -
A teenager has been shot in the leg on Eagle Drive, in south Jackson. Police are on scene investigating.
According to JPD Commander Tyree Jones, a 16-year-old man was shot in the upper leg by 20-year-old Marcquest Wells.
Wells is wanted for aggravated assault.
Shooter identified: Marcquest Wells, 20, #wanted for aggravated assault stemming from tonight's shooting on Eagle Dr. 16yo victim is stable. pic.twitter.com/MYpTlI6AZ4
— Jackson Police Dept. (@JacksonMSPolice) December 14, 2016
Wells was with another man identified as "Nick".
A fight led to the shooting. The victim is in stable condition.
We will update this as more information becomes available.
